alert.note: Alert for Emmet; Kossuth; Palo Alto (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:05PM CDT until May 11 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR EMMET...NORTHWESTERN KOSSUTH AND NORTHWESTERN PALO ALTO COUNTIES... At 705 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ceylon to near Swan Lake to near Lost Island Lake, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dolliver, Okamanpedan Lake, Okamanpedan State Park, Iowa Lake and Armstrong. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
